issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I am not sure but with my latest 20160426 nightly build I get this error all the time :

[ERROR] :  The remote procedure call failed.
[ERROR] :  Error: The remote procedure call failed.
    at ChildProcess.<anonymous> (C:\Users\jorgenbuder\Library\Application Support\Titanium\mobilesdk\win32\5.4.0.v20160426000033\node_modules\windowslib\lib\wptool.js:703:10)
    at ChildProcess.emit (events.js:110:17)
    at maybeClose (child_process.js:1015:16)
    at Process.ChildProcess._handle.onexit (child_process.js:1087:5)

And I am thinking does this have anything to do with not getting logs at all on device ?

this is what I can recall not happening on Emulator, I will check..

comments.body: Confirmed this is not happening in the older 5.4.0.v20160406002717 SDK however I cannot see any largely connection there either..
5.4.x branch was broken yesterday. crash in wptools should be fixed in todays' build: 5.4.0.v20160428075219 .
